alert.note: Alert for Magoffin; Morgan; Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 06 at 7:08PM EDT until May 06 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of east central Kentucky and southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, in east central Kentucky, Estill. In southeast Kentucky, Breathitt, Lee, Magoffin, Morgan, Owsley and Wolfe. * WHEN...Until 915 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 706 PM EDT, emergency management reported minor flooding ongoing at multiple locations in the advisory area due to prior moderate to heavy rainfall. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen through the day. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area with more showers and storms this evening. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... West Liberty, Jackson, Salyersville, Beattyville, Campton, Booneville, Mason, Simpson, Henry, Lewis, Fincastle, Lane, Hollonville, Bethany, Pence, Vortex, Mary, Baptist, Landsaw and Paxton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
